name: Halberd-Crest Bird
description: A medium-sized bird that can be found in Natlan. Its huge crest looks like the blade of a halberd, and is an excellent deterrent. Even the fiercest of monsters think twice before trying to hunt them... After being relocated to The Realm Within, these birds, owing to their fierce appearance, assumed a new role â€” alongside the teacup lid, they became both spear and shield for Tubby, keeping pastries safe from the greedy beaks of certain avians...
